questiontext.text:
Rainfall data were taken in two regions in Ghana: Elamat and Palstond. However, the data has been collected into two data frames: one contains data from 1990-1999, and the other from 2000-2016.

The former data set contains the station name, the date, year, rainfall (mm), minimum temperature (Celsius), and maximum temperature (Celsius).

The latter data set contains the station name, date, year, rainfall (cm), minimum temperature (Celsius), and maximum temperature (Celsius), and hours of sunshine.

The task is to combine the data sets and answer the following questions:
(Note that this is “made up” data)


1. Which year had the least overall rainfall?

[[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]]


2. Which region had more rainfall between 1990-2016 (inclusive)?

[[input:ans2]] [[validation:ans2]]


3. How much rainfall was there in total across both stations in 2016 in \(mm\)?


Give your answer to 2 decimal places.

[[input:ans3]] [[validation:ans3]]

[[feedback:prt1]]
